channel.title: Posts on fromskratch
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on fromskratch

item.title: Building a backend for my website
item.description: A webpage is a bit limited without some server-side handling. You know… like having cool URLs, and probably some other things as well that I don’t care. But why don’t use it as a learning experience? :)

item.title: Creating a basic on-prem personal blog
item.description: Finding good side projects to build sure is hard, specially for a beginner with not that much of experience. So why don’t I start blogging about random stuff I learn?
